content: This one (#14370) contains some very non-mathematical proofs about lists and fin; could someone take a look?
how usable is of_fn_mul in practice? it looks like a horrific term but I guess in these applications it can be simplified a lot
I'm not really sure, I mainly just wanted the add lemmas and figured while it was on my mind I'd do the others too
I do expect to want the mul lemma for dealing with powers of tensor powers where the index type ends up getting multiplied on one side or the other.
